data.comment: The match has started.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, Can 1. FC Cologne capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Union Berlin's half?
Corner awarded to Union Berlin.
Union Berlin to take a throw-in in 1. FC Cologne territory.
In the minute 6, Ball goes out of play for a Union Berlin goal kick.
Can Union Berlin get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half?
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 9, Union Berlin awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Union Berlin's Marcus Ingvartsen misses with an attempt on goal.
Tobias Stieler awards 1. FC Cologne a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Tobias Stieler signals a Union Berlin throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
Union Berlin push upfield but Tobias Stieler quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Union Berlin in their own half.
Union Berlin advance rapidly upfield but Tobias Stieler blows for offside.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Union Berlin.
In the minute 14, 1. FC Cologne have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
In Cologne, Sebastian Andersson (1. FC Cologne) misses the target with a header.
Union Berlin have a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
1. FC Cologne have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal kick for Union Berlin at RheinEnergieStadion.
In the minute 17, It's a goal kick for the home team in Cologne.
In Cologne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 20, It's a goal kick for the home team in Cologne.
Throw-in Union Berlin.
Free kick Union Berlin.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Union Berlin close to the penalty box.
Tobias Stieler signals a throw-in for Union Berlin, close to 1. FC Cologne's area.
1. FC Cologne pushes forward through Ismail Jakobs, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 24, 1. FC Cologne to take a throw-in in Union Berlin territory.
Free kick for Union Berlin in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 27, Taiwo Awoniyi scores to make it 0-1 at RheinEnergieStadion.
Ball goes out of play for a Union Berlin goal kick.
The away team replace Sebastian Griesbeck with Grischa Promel.
In the minute 31, Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to Union Berlin.
1. FC Cologne's Ondrej Duda has been booked in Cologne.
In the minute 32, Union Berlin needs to be cautious. 1. FC Cologne have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Union Berlin at RheinEnergieStadion.
In the minute 35, Union Berlin will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from 1. FC Cologne.
Marcus Ingvartsen for Union Berlin has been booked by Tobias Stieler and receives a first yellow card.
Ellyes Skhiri equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
Ondrej Duda with an assist there.
In the minute 37, Tobias Stieler awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Union Berlin in their own half.
Tobias Stieler signals a Union Berlin throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Union Berlin in their own half.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
1. FC Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Union Berlin have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Corner awarded to 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 44, 1. FC Cologne attack but Ellyes Skhiri's header doesn't find the target.
Tobias Stieler awards Union Berlin a goal kick.
Union Berlin have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to Union Berlin in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Union Berlin in Cologne.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at RheinEnergieStadion.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Union Berlin close to the penalty box.
In the minute 47, 1. FC Cologne have a goal kick.
Tobias Stieler signals a throw-in for Union Berlin, close to 1. FC Cologne's area.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Union Berlin.
Can Union Berlin get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in 1. FC Cologne's half?
Can Union Berlin capitalize from this throw-in deep inside 1. FC Cologne's half?
In the minute 53, 1. FC Cologne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a 1. FC Cologne goal kick.
In the minute 56, Ball safe as Union Berlin is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Cologne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Union Berlin in the half of 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 62, 1. FC Cologne have a goal kick.
Grischa Promel of Union Berlin gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cologne.
In the minute 63, Tobias Stieler signals a 1. FC Cologne throw-in in Union Berlin's half.
Free kick for Union Berlin in their own half.
At RheinEnergieStadion, 1. FC Cologne are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 65, Markus Gisdol is making the team's first substitution at RheinEnergieStadion with Dimitris Limnios replacing Dominick Drexler.
The home team have replaced Ondrej Duda with Elvis Rexhbecaj. This is the second substitution made today by Markus Gisdol.
Union Berlin's Marcus Ingvartsen gets in a shot but it is blocked by a 1. FC Cologne defender.
In the minute 68, Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Free kick 1. FC Cologne.
Tobias Stieler awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 69, 1. FC Cologne to take a throw-in in Union Berlin territory.
Goal kick for Union Berlin at RheinEnergieStadion.
An attacking Union Berlin player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 72, Max Kruse (Union Berlin) had a chance from the penalty spot but missed!
Max Kruse is on target to give Union Berlin a 1-2 advantage.
Akaki Gogia is replacing Marcus Ingvartsen for Union Berlin at RheinEnergieStadion.
In the minute 73, Cedric Teuchert is replacing Taiwo Awoniyi for the away team.
Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
Union Berlin push forward at RheinEnergieStadion and Max Kruse gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined 1. FC Cologne defence.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Union Berlin at RheinEnergieStadion.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Union Berlin.
Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
1. FC Cologne have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
In the minute 79, 1. FC Cologne's Rafael Czichos attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Tobias Stieler awards Union Berlin a goal kick.
In the minute 79, 1. FC Cologne make their third substitution with Jan Thielmann replacing Noah Katterbach.
Kingsley Ehizibue is on a sub for Marius Wolf for 1. FC Cologne.
Cedric Teuchert (Union Berlin) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 81, Elvis Rexhbecaj of 1. FC Cologne smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to 1. FC Cologne.
Rafael Czichos (1. FC Cologne) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 82, 1. FC Cologne have been awarded a corner by Tobias Stieler.
Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Union Berlin.
1. FC Cologne make their fifth substitution with Toluwalase Emmanuel Arokodare replacing Salih Ozcan.
In the minute 84, Goal kick for Union Berlin at RheinEnergieStadion.
The away team replace Robert Andrich with Julian Ryerson.
In the minute 85, Free kick for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
Urs Fischer (Union Berlin) is making a fifth substitution, with Niko Giesselmann replacing Sheraldo Becker.
Throw-in Union Berlin.
Free kick 1. FC Cologne.
In the minute 87, It's a goal kick for the away team in Cologne.
Ball safe as 1. FC Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in their own half.
In the minute 89, 1. FC Cologne are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in for 1. FC Cologne in the half of Union Berlin.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Tobias Stieler signals a free kick to Union Berlin in their own half.
Can 1. FC Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Union Berlin's half?
Can 1. FC Cologne capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
Niko Giesselmann (Union Berlin) has received a first yellow card.
